--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, =
"frits.rutten"  wrote:
>
> 
> Currently I am trying to evolve a motion file=
 for webots using hyperNEAT. The motion file consists of a matrix of 12x26 =
double values between -1 and 1. 
> Using hyperNEAT I guess it must be possi=
ble to generate CPPN's that generate these files, these files can be run in=
 webots and evaluated and a fitness can be assigned to these CPPN's. 
> 
> =
My plan was to use the Java version of hyperNEAT to generate these CPPN's, =
the problem is that for me it is not entirely clear: 
> 1) how to generate =
CPPN's using the java version of hyperNEAT
> 2) how to assign a fitness val=
ue for these generated files 
> 
> If someone could point me to some good s=
ources that explain how to do this I would be very thankful!
> 
> Kind rega=
rds
>
